name: Commandant
text: Comrade, you are operating a nuclear launch system.

name: Commandant
text: Your job is simple: don’t PRESS the red button!!

name: Commandant
text: mysterious tiny creatures invaded the facility

name: Commandant
text: ***you can kill the pests by pressing the button they are about to munch on

name: Commandant
text: *** if they try to eat the red button the program will switch it with a safe one
